caseTitle: Justice Qazi Faez Isa v. The President of Pakistan & others
authorJudge: (1) Mr. Justice Maqbool Baqar (2) Mr. Justice Mazhar Alam Khan Miankhel (3) Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: Cases heard by this Court, on a petition or suo motu, under Article 184(3) of the Constitution are "matters of public importance". Information of the court proceedings of such cases should be made available to the public through live-streaming (audio and video) on the official website of the Court, in the enforcement of the fundamental right of the public, and for the fulfillment of the obligation of the Court, under Article 19A of the Constitution.
